LanguageData.Miho_MechSmokeGrenade.label: Smoke Grenade
LanguageData.Miho_MechThermobaricGrenade.label: Thermobaric Grenade
LanguageData.Miho_MechThermobaricGrenade.description: Fires a large-caliber bomb at a high angle like a mortar. The range is 120 tiles.
LanguageData.Miho_MechPlasmaSpray.label: Plasma Salvo
LanguageData.Miho_MechPlasmaSpray.description: Spray ultra-high heat plasma at short distances.
